tourBios.carHigh:
Has competed on West Florida Golf Tour, NGA Tour and the Florida Professional Golf Tour.

2013: Made one Web.com Tour start during the year, missing the cut at the Midwest Classic in July.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Won two collegiate events in 2007-08 (Kau'ai Collegiate Cup and Mizuno Intercollegiate), earning Southern Conference Freshman of the Year...Earned Southern Conference Player of the Year honors in 2008-09...Was a Srixon All-American in 2009-10 and 2010-11...Played on Southern Conference team champion (Georgia Southern) in 2010-11.
tourBios.personal: Has one sister and one brother, Brett, who was a four-year letterman on the Florida Southern College golf team...Attended Lakeland High School, where he was class valedictorian...Earned four letters in golf and three in tennis...Was district champion in tennis one year and a two-time County Player of the Year in golf...Favorite golf memory was playing St. Andrews and Augusta National with his college teammates...Biggest golf thrill was shooting 66-63 in a local junior tournament at age 16...If not a professional golfer, he would likely work in finance...Favorite teams as a kid were Georiga Tech and the Atlanta Braves...Favorite teams are now the Tampa Bay Rays, Georgia Southern and the Florida Gators...Pebble Beach GL and Seminole GC are atop his list of courses he'd like to play... Favorite TV shows involve history and science...Favorite movies are "Dumb and Dumber," "The Hangover" and "The Sandlot."...Favorite entertainers are John Mayer, Lil Wayne and P-Groove...Favorite book is The Christ Blueprint...Likes chicken and vegetables and Chick-fil-A...Favorite athletes are B.J. Upton and LeBron James...Favorite vacation spots/cities to visit are California and Seattle, Wash...Charity involvement is with Carver Steet Village of Hope and Parker Street Ministries.
